course_description: This course draws upon the Conference of the Parties (COP) to the United Nations Framework on Climate Change (UNFCCC) as a way to explain interdisciplinary issues related to the science, policy, and business of climate change through multimedia.
schedule_location: MW 4pm-5:15pm in Math & Science Center - W502
sections: Class Nbr: 2501, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 4-5:15p, Instructor: E. Saikawa, Status: Open
